channel.title: Color Question
channel.description:
What color chart are items' colors based off of?
<pictureMask>65535</pictureMask>
is rune and I'm trying to get certain colors to make new items but I don't know how to get the right color value.

item.title: Color Question
item.dc:creator: @RSCShadow RSCShadow
item.description:
@RSCShadow wrote:

Take a hex value (like FFFFFF) and convert it to decimal value with the MS calculator.

Read full topic

item.title: Color Question
item.dc:creator: @xEnt xEnt
item.description:
@xEnt wrote:

try this code out, compile and run it.


import java.io.IOException;
import java.util.Scanner;

public class Main {

	public static void main(String... args) throws InterruptedException, IOException {
		String[] colorStr = {"Red", "Green", "Blue"};
		int[] colorVal = new int[3];
		Scanner scanner = new Scanner(System.in);
		for(int i=0; i < 3; i++) {
			System.out.println("Enter " + colorStr[i] + ": ");
			colorVal[i] = Integer.parseInt(scanner.next().trim());
		}
		System.out.println("Color: " + convertRGBToLong(colorVal[0], colorVal[1], colorVal[2]));
		System.in.read();
	}

	public static int convertRGBToLong(int red, int green, int blue) {
		return (red << 16) + (green << 8) + blue;
	}

}

part taken from the RSC client. enter the RGB of the color you want and it should convert it to the color you need to enter. (tell me if it does too)

Read full topic
